title: FT: T206 Carolina Brights Unglaub SGC 10
author: soxinseven

posts.post_title: FT: T206 Carolina Brights Unglaub SGC 10
posts.post_content:
I have an SGC 10 Carolina Brights of Unglaub for sale/trade. The card has an Ex front with paper loss on the back. Scans can be seen in the "Cards" album in my profile.
I primarily collect Red Sox type cards but am open to other offers. Price is $80.00 delivered.
                                              Thanks,
                                                Steve
CARD IS SOLD!!!!!

Card is now for sale. $80.00 delivered. Trade offers still welcome.
                                           Thanks,
                                            Steve
